Code preview of the reference ContinentForCountry

USE DATABASECOUNTRYHL
go

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1
FROM SYS.SYSREFERENCES R JOIN SYS.SYSOBJECTS O ON (O.ID = R.CONSTID AND O.TYPE = 'F')
WHERE R.FKEYID = OBJECT_ID('COUNTRY') AND O.NAME = 'FK_COUNTRY_CONTINENT_CONTINEN')
ALTER TABLE COUNTRY
DROP CONSTRAINT FK_COUNTRY_CONTINENT_CONTINEN
go

ALTER TABLE COUNTRY
ADD CONSTRAINT FK_COUNTRY_CONTINENT_CONTINEN FOREIGN KEY (CON_ID)
REFERENCES CONTINENT (CON_ID)
go
